data.title: Animaniacs, Tiny Toons and Pinky and the Brain
data.text:
​Rob Paulsen - Animaniacs, Tiny Toons and Pinky and the Brain - Rob Paulsen joins Pete A Turner to discuss the return of the Animanicas to Zulu TV. Rob's life as a performer began with humble beginnings and a drive. His father saying what all father say, chase your dream, but don't expect help.

Watch the Animaniacs on Hula TV

It work, Rob's dream came true. He and his peers have performed the voices for dozens of our favorite characters from shows like Jimmy Neutron, Animaniacs, Tiny Toons, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. Pete A Turner and Rob bond instantly each doing their own imitations and we know there's more to come.

​

The live episode is available here - youtu.be/Z4u_2ua0niQ

Watch Rob's TedTalk here

Haiku

His voice makes you smile

Animaniacs are back

Joy, his gift to us

The Break It Down Show is your favorite best, new podcast, featuring 5 episodes a week with great interviews highlighting world-class guests from a wide array of shows
